channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Stickers on bin need removing please, 14th September
item.description:
Stickers on bin need removing please.

item.title: Outside number 18/20, 14th September
item.description:
Large potholes causing traffic (particularly busses and HGVs) to bump down road vibrating nearby houses. I've lived on this road for over 6 years and no repairs have ever been completed on this road. The whole thing needs resurfacing desperately. The resulting vibration is damaging the listed buildings on Cambridge Avenue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 77, 14th September
item.description:
The road surface is shocking - previous potholes have been badly patched and the road surface is uneven and broken. This section of road needs to be resurfaced. This is a hazard for cyclists - particularly as we move into winter. This defect has been there for some time now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swain's Lane, Dartmouth Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish strewn over street, 14th September
item.description:
Bin bags with food waste dumped on the street that have clearly been shredded by animals. Why doesn't the council enforce the use of wheelie bins?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 160, Maple Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 14th September
item.description:

item.title: Small cracks on Sutherland walk, just past the scooter bay and the hairdresserare trip hazards, 14th September
